page.title: 01Crockenhill.An introduction.
page.content: Crockenhill has about 560 homes and an electorate of about 1200.It is well balanced as far as age ,status and social groupings are concerned.A 55 unit mixed development at Seven Acres is being built now.There is a lively village community though older people say it was better in the past.Local activities survive by relying on small bands of enthusiasts.It is easy ,however,to underestimate the extent of commitment because people tend to concentrate on one activity without knowing what else is going on. The village wants to preserve its identity from suburbia which ends at St.Mary Cray.It has been called"The sleeping dragon".It passes its days without excitement until its status quo is threatened and then it is aroused and all go to its defence.
